headline: Show HN: Dream Makers Community – What is your dream and what is stopping you
description:
Hey HN!

Did a website to share what is your dream or what you want, and what is stopping you. That way the community can help you remove the obstacles to make the dream come true or that is the naive approach hehe. Imagine I should add users, a captcha, a mailer, more things, but it is a start. It is built with Rails and plain ERB with Bootstrap and the source code is at: https://github.com/altuzar/dream_makers

It is 100% inspired by the TED Talk by this lady https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H2rG4Dg6xyI

Hope you like it!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 造梦者社区--你的梦想是什么，什么在阻止你？
